foreignData.name: Steinflüster-Kristall
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, opfere den Steinflüster-Kristall: Schicke die Friedhöfe einer beliebigen Anzahl an Spielern deiner Wahl ins Exil. Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Cristal de orapétreo
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Cristal de orapétreo: Exilia los cementerios de cualquier cantidad de jugadores objetivo. Roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Cristal parle-pierre
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez le Cristal parle-pierre : Exilez les cimetières de n'importe quel nombre de joueurs ciblés. Piochez une carte.

foreignData.name: Cristallo dell'Oratore delle Pietre
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica il Cristallo dell'Oratore delle Pietre: Esilia un qualsiasi numero di cimiteri di giocatori bersaglio. Pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: ストーンスピーカー・クリスタル
foreignData.text:
{T}：{C}{C}を加える。
{2},{T},ストーンスピーカー・クリスタルを生け贄に捧げる：望む数のプレイヤーを対象とする。それらのプレイヤーの墓地を追放する。あなたはカード１枚を引く。

foreignData.name: 암석대변인 수정
foreignData.text:
{T}: {C}{C}를 추가한다.
{2}, {T}, 암석대변인 수정을 희생한다: 플레이어를 원하는 수만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어들의 무덤들을 추방한다. 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Cristal do Orador das Pedras
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrifique Cristal do Orador das Pedras: Exile qualquer número de cemitérios de jogadores alvo. Compre um card.

foreignData.name: Говорящий с Камнями Кристалл
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте Говорящий с Камнями Кристалл: изгоните кладбища любого количества целевых игроков. Возьмите карту.

foreignData.name: 石语者水晶
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{C}{C}。
{2}，{T}，牺牲石语者水晶：放逐任意数量目标牌手的坟墓场。抓一张牌。

foreignData.name: 石語者水晶
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{C}{C}。
{2}，{T}，犧牲石語者水晶：放逐任意數量目標玩家的墳墓場。抽一張牌。

name: Stonespeaker Crystal
originalText:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Stonespeaker Crystal: Exile any number of target players' graveyards. Draw a card.

rulings.text: You choose any number of target players as you put Stonespeaker Crystal's ability on the stack and exile their graveyards as it resolves. You may not target a player and then choose not to exile their graveyard.
You may choose to target no players while activating the last ability if you just want to draw a card.

text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Stonespeaker Crystal: Exile any number of target players' graveyards. Draw a card.
